Settings for MS1/2 parameters.

This functions create the default settings for writeMethodXmls().

defaultMs1Settings(...)

defaultMs2Settings(...)

Arguments

…

named arguments that should be overwritten.

Value

A named list of settings.

Examples

# all default MS1 settings
defaultMs1Settings()
#> $FirstMass
#> [1] 400
#> 
#> $LastMass
#> [1] 1200
#> 
#> $Microscans
#> [1] 10
#> 

# overwrite FirstMass and set AgcTarget
defaultMs1Settings(FirstMass=100, AgcTarget=c(1e4, 1e5))
#> $FirstMass
#> [1] 100
#> 
#> $LastMass
#> [1] 1200
#> 
#> $Microscans
#> [1] 10
#> 
#> $AgcTarget
#> [1] 1e+04 1e+05
#> 

# all default MS2 settings
defaultMs2Settings()
#> $ActivationType
#> [1] "ETD"
#> 
#> $AgcTarget
#> [1] 1e+05 5e+05 1e+06
#> 
#> $ETDReagentTarget
#> [1] 1e+06 5e+06 1e+07
#> 
#> $ETDReactionTime
#> [1]  0.0  2.5  5.0 10.0 15.0 30.0 50.0
#> 
#> $ETDSupplementalActivation
#> [1] "ETciD" "EThcD"
#> 
#> $ETDSupplementalActivationEnergy
#> [1]  0  7 14 21 28 35
#> 
#> $IsolationWindow
#> [1] 1
#> 
#> $MaxITTimeInMS
#> [1] 200
#> 
#> $Microscans
#> [1] 40
#> 
#> $OrbitrapResolution
#> [1] "R120K"
#> 

# overwrite AgcTarget
defaultMs2Settings(AgcTarget=c(1e4, 1e5))
#> $ActivationType
#> [1] "ETD"
#> 
#> $AgcTarget
#> [1] 1e+04 1e+05
#> 
#> $ETDReagentTarget
#> [1] 1e+06 5e+06 1e+07
#> 
#> $ETDReactionTime
#> [1]  0.0  2.5  5.0 10.0 15.0 30.0 50.0
#> 
#> $ETDSupplementalActivation
#> [1] "ETciD" "EThcD"
#> 
#> $ETDSupplementalActivationEnergy
#> [1]  0  7 14 21 28 35
#> 
#> $IsolationWindow
#> [1] 1
#> 
#> $MaxITTimeInMS
#> [1] 200
#> 
#> $Microscans
#> [1] 40
#> 
#> $OrbitrapResolution
#> [1] "R120K"
#>
